search.query: | inputlookup nesa_volume_groups | stats count by arrayId, arrayName

| inputlookup nesa_volume_groups_component | search host="$arrayId$" | table componentType | dedup componentType | eval componentTypeVal="(componentType=\"".componentType."\")" | table componentType, componentTypeVal
| inputlookup nesa_volume_groups_component | search host="$arrayId$" $componentType$ | eval event=eventType." - ".description | table event,eventType | dedup event,eventType

`get_nesa_index` sourcetype=eseries:mel-events host="$arrayId$" $componentType$ | rename comment AS "Deduplicate this, based on the sequenceNumber field" | stats min(_time) AS _time, min(_indextime) AS first_seen, max(_indextime) AS last_seen, first(_raw) AS _raw by host, sequenceNumber | fields - sequenceNumber | spath | `ctime(timeStamp)` AS stamp | `ctime(*seen)` | eval priority=replace(priority, "priority", "") | eval eventType=tostring(eventType, "hex") | search eventType="$event$" | JOIN type=LEFT host [inputlookup array_controller_label.csv | rename arrayId as host | table host, arrayName] | eval Time=_time | convert timeformat="%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S" ctime(Time) | table Time, first_seen, last_seen, arrayName, stamp, priority, critical, description, sequenceNumber, eventType, category, componentType, componentLocation.label, eventSourceController | rename first_seen AS "First seen" last_seen AS "Last seen" priority AS Priority arrayName AS Array stamp AS Stamp critical AS Critical description AS Description sequenceNumber AS "Sequence #" eventType AS "Event Type" category AS Category componentType AS "Component Type" componentLocation.label AS "Component Location" eventSourceController AS "Source Controller"
